alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bradley and western Drew Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hermitage, or 11 miles southwest of Warren, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Hermitage... Wilmar... Green Hill... Ingalls... Lanark... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Banks... New Hope in Drew County... Carmel... Farmville... Johnsonville... Valley... Gravelridge... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Sumpter... Lacey... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
